Articles.Content:
Hello there Kerbonauts,

I'm just about amazed at this game got the full yesterday and basically spent the last hour making a simple module for catching and deorbiting the numerous debris i left behind (it's a bit messy but using the KAS winch proved itself useful)

I've already crashed into Mun.

Haha sounds fun but you could just go into the debris (square bracket) and end flight to get red of it but that sound fun too but the end flight is a lot quicker.

but anyway welcome and fly safe!
Welcome! hope you get all that debris out of there no need for crashing into the fuel tank you left up there .
Mokmo... rings a bell... How ya doin' man?
